description: This is an HTML file implementing a front-end interface for a database viewer application. It contains HTML structure, CSS styles for layout and appearance, and JavaScript code to fetch database, table, and data information from backend APIs and dynamically render the content.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables and loads the tables if needed.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table, displaying data in a tabular format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for a data table from JSON data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates an HTML cell, with special handling for long text, objects, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full text or object details.
